app.name: vWii-compat-installer
app.short_description: Install the Homebrew Channel to the vWii Menu from Wii U Mode.
app.long_description: Install a channel to the vWii Menu from Wii U Mode. In its current state, it simply installs the Homebrew Channel. source code: https://github.com/TheLordScruffy/vwii-compat-installer
